message.body: Do u have a planer and joiner set up at your shop?
Don't really plan on getting jointer unless I get a project that absolutely needs one.
What's your planer set up? I've got my delta and new blades. I'm trying to plane some rough sawn 5/4 maple and its a bit heavy to do on my set up.
I can prolly work it out with some rollers
It's a steel city with helical head. Same size as yours though.
